summary: A diffusion pipeline that generates images from textual prompts while grounding them to specified regions using GLIGEN, integrating VAE encoding/decoding, CLIP text encoding, UNet denoising, schedulers, and safety checking.
business_intent: Enable developers and creators to produce customized, regionâ€‘aware images from natural language for applications such as advertising, design, gaming, and content creation, while ensuring generated content is safe.
